parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: ConnectionDomain
parameters.description: The endpoint of the node. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the endpoint of the node.

parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type. For more information about valid values, see [Instance types](~~57141~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceDescription
parameters.description:
The name of the instance. The name must meet the following requirements:

*   The name must start with a letter.
*   It can contain digits, letters, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   It must be 2 to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID.

parameters.name: DBInstanceStatus
parameters.description: The state of the instance. For more information about valid values, see [Instance states](~~63870~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceType
parameters.description:
The architecture of the instance. Valid values:

*   **sharding**: sharded cluster instance
*   **replicate**: replica set or standalone instance

parameters.name: DBNodeType
parameters.description:
The type of the node in the instance. This parameter is used to filter standard or test instance.

1.  Valid value for a standalone or DBFS instance.
2.  Valid value for a standard instance that comes in the replica set or sharded cluster architecture: standard
3.  Valid value when all instances are displayed: default

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine of the instance. Set the value to **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description:
The database engine version of the instance. Valid values:

*   **5.0**
*   **4.4**
*   **4.2**
*   **4.0**
*   **3.4**

parameters.name: ExpireTime
parameters.description: The time when the instance expires.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the instance has expired. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Classic**
*   **VPC**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value of this parameter must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   **30** (default)
*   **50**
*   **100**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ReplicationFactor
parameters.description:
The number of nodes in the replica set instance. Valid values:

*   **3**
*   **5**
*   **7**

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID of the instance.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The VPC ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
